name: ExamResultsAPI
short_description:
This API provides a means to access all http://www.nicacresults.com/indian-exam-results-api/ Indian exam results via this API, no matter whether it your academic results or entrance test results or recruitment results, it covers all. 

The results API is developed by NicAcResults.com to provides east solution to access various results in India. The free results API is useful for individuals and website owners and bloggers who want to stay updated with all India exam results and provide the same to their users. Using this API you are sure that you don't miss any update from around the nation.

The API works based on the inputs provided to it. There is a one time setup process, that includes manually validating the results resource webpage and then adding it to the API.

The NicAcResults API uses RSS and crawling technology to bring you latest exam results from various colleges/universities in India.

More on this visit official API page at Nicacresults
